document.text:
From: Bruce Barket <bbarket(Oarketepstein.com>
To: (USANYS)"  
Cc: USANYS)" 
Subject: RE: update 
Date: Wed, 26 Feb 2020 18:03:49 +0000 
12,usdoj.gov> 
So maybe my trial judge's ears were ringing. I just got a renewed scheduling order giving us March 4th off. So, no issue 
for next week. 
But, I am obviously still curious about your progress. We have deliberately sat on the sidelines since your appointment, 
but have quite a  bit of information, documents, emails, est that may be relevant depending on your needs. 
Bruce A. Barket, Esq. 
Barket Epstein Kearon Aldea & LoTurco, LLP 
666 Old Country Road , Ste. 700 
Garden City, NY 11530 
(516) 745 1500 [P1 (516) 745 1245 [F] 
www.barketepstein.com 
This transmittal may be a confidential attorney client communication or may otherwise be privileged or confidential. If it is not clear 
that you are the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that you have received this transmittal in error; any review, dissemination, 
distribution or copying of this transmittal is strictly prohibited. If you suspect that you have received this communication in error, 
please notify us immediately by telephone or email and immediately delete this message and all its attachments 
From:I USANYS) 
Sent: Tuesday, February 25, 2020 1:20 PM 
To: Bruce Barket <bbarket@barketepstein.com> 
Cc: Graff, Ilan (USANYS) < 
Subject: RE: update 
@usdoj.gov> 
Bruce, 
We will be in a better position to answer your question tomorrow and will plan on getting back to you then. Hopefully, 
that does not cause too much of an inconvenience. 
Thanks, 
Margery 
From: Bruce Barket 
<bbarket@barketepstein.com>
Sent: Monday, February 24, 2020 1:20 PM 
To: USANYS)pusa.dol,gcao 
Subject: update 
Good afternoon, 
I am writing because my trial which was supposed to begin today has been moved to March 3rd. I asked the Court (EDNY) 
for March 4th off so I would be able to attend the status conference for Mr. Tartaglione and I explained briefly that there 
was a Curcio issue. That application was denied. 
So, I am wondering if you will be requesting more time to continue to review material and presumably get input from our 
firm. If so, then it may make sense to adjourn the conference. If you don't need more time, then I may make another 
EFTA00032314

request or ask Judge Karas to help. I don't think there is much else that will be done next week other than address the 
Curcio issue. 
Thank you. 
Bruce A. Barket, Esq. 
Barket Epstein Kearon Aldea & LoTurco, LLP 
666 Old Country Road ,  Ste. 700 
Garden City, NY 11530 
(516) 745 1500 (PJ (516) 745 1245 [F] 
www.barketepstein.com 
This transmittal may be a confidential attorney client communication or may otherwise be privileged or confidential. If it is not clear
